flavorText:
"Aselbo soon had the rhino eating from his palm and the snake waiting at his heels."
—Afari, *Tales*

foreignData.name: Irdischer Lehrmeister
foreignData.text: Durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach einer Kreaturenkarte und zeige diese Karte allen Spielern. Mische danach Deine Bibliothek neu und lege die gezeigte Karte oben auf Deine Bibliothek.

name: Worldly Tutor
originalText: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card to all players. Shuffle your library and put the revealed card back on top of it.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put the card on top.
